Name: Pirate Island Mini Golf VR
About the game: Welcome to Pirate Island Mini Golf - VR! As of the Scallywag Update, Pirate Island Mini Golf VR is now a multiplayer player virtual reality experience set in a scenic tropical island. Up to four of your friends can play any of the four, 18-hole courses placed throughout the old pirate stronghold. Each course has multiple challenges and enhancements that can be unlocked, to mix up game play and keep you coming back for more. So come to Pirate Island! Tune in the radio to a music style of your choice and play a couple rounds. Take a swim in the ocean to find hidden, unique sea shells that unlock new content, or just watch the fireflies come out as the sun sets over the horizon. Pirate Island Mini Golf VR - Available for purchase on Steam.
